CustomField.description: Calculates when an emails should be scheduled to be sent (higher is sooner)
CustomField.formula:
CASE( DaysSinceScheduled__c,
0, VALUE(Text(Importance__c)) * (DaysSinceScheduled__c + 1), 1, VALUE(Text(Importance__c)) * DaysSinceScheduled__c, 2, VALUE(Text(Importance__c)) * DaysSinceScheduled__c * 2, 3, VALUE(Text(Importance__c)) * DaysSinceScheduled__c * 2,
10 * VALUE(Text(Importance__c)) * DaysSinceScheduled__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates when an emails should be scheduled to be sent (higher is sooner)
CustomField.label: Priority
